Room.Name: Garden Circle Road
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Garden Circle Road, which encircles the Hanging Gardens.
Room.LongDescription: Although the Gardens were built for Queen Isaria a long time ago, It is Elise who enjoys them today. Elise is the most powerful mage in Kista, a White Moon, a Preserver Wizard. She is well respected in the Towers. She spends much of her free time in the Garden.
